thread.title: Manchester United news: Watch Paul Pogba's class piece of skill v St Etienne | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United news: Watch Paul Pogba's class piece of skill v St Etienne | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United news: Watch Paul Pogba's class piece of skill v St Etienne | Metro News
text:
— We Stand United (@TheManchesterU) February 22, 2017 
There are few players who pull off extravagant pieces of skill like Paul Pogba and the Manchester United star pulled a new trick out of the hat last night. VOTE: Who'd you pick for Arsenal manager if they also brought 3 star players with them? 
During his side’s 1-0 win against St Etienne Pogba found himself in a tight spot by the sideline but used great improvisation to move past his marker. 
He kicked the ball into the ground with the base of his foot, which cannoned over the defender’s head as he turned round him before finding Bastian Schweinsteiger who curled a shot over the bar.
